title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI for member-owned financials: Systems that serve  (AIM337)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 面向会员制金融机构的智能体AI：服务型系统 (AIM337)
abstract: Credit unions and insurance organizations can leverage AI agents for automating complex workflows. In this code talk we’ll demonstrate going from concept to production with spec-driven development. We’ll work backwards from your business processes such as lending automation, claims processing, and fraud detection to turn prompts into detailed specifications, code, documents, and tests. Using prompts as code, we'll build production-ready agents using Strands Agents SDK and AWS services. Attendees will leave equipped with implementation tools, sample code, and best practices for building and deploying agentic AI solutions that transform credit union and insurance operations while ensuring explainable, compliant AI decision-making.
abstract_cn: 信用合作社和保险机构可以利用AI代理来自动化复杂工作流程。在这次代码演讲中，我们将演示如何通过规范驱动开发从概念到生产的全过程。我们将从您的业务流程（如放贷自动化、理赔处理和欺诈检测）出发，将提示转换为详细的规范、代码、文档和测试。使用提示即代码的方式，我们将利用Strands Agents SDK和AWS服务构建生产就绪的代理。参会者将掌握实施工具、示例代码以及构建和部署代理AI解决方案的最佳实践，这些解决方案将变革信用合作社和保险业务运营，同时确保AI决策的可解释性和合规性。
